column1: Kata Robata////I do give credit to the ambiance and the space. It's a cool set-up
column2: and not as loud as some reviewers say it is. I had no problem hearing my dining companions at 8pm on a Saturday night
column3: and there were plenty of open tables. And
column4: as wrong as this is to say
column6: there is some type of vanilla incense going on in there.
